content:
I'm checking this search parameter: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/SearchParameter-endpoint-usecase-standard.html

After checking extension Endpoint Use Case it's not clear what values can be there: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition-endpoint-usecase.html

Does it mean that it can be valueCoding, valueCodableConcept, valueCode, valueId, valueIdentifier, valueString, etc?

The endpoint use case contains two values:
Type CodeableConcept. Binding: Endpoint Usecases (extensible)
Standard. uri

I'm not sure why these are rendered in a distinct manner, but the JSON looks correct.
